title: Armor Traits
content:
Trait NameEffect Description
PlatedProvides +1 to Save rolls against melee attacks.
- Rigid layers deflect close-range blows with solid protection.
PaddedGrants +1 to Save rolls against ranged attacks.
- Cushioned lining absorbs the impact of incoming shots and shrapnel.
ReinforcedThe wearer may reroll all Save rolls of 1.
- These suits are often well internally braced, or lined with redundant plates.
BarbedWhen this model rolls a Critical Save, the attacker suffers 1 damage.
- A brutal deterrent for attackers.
InsulatedThis model reduces damage from certain sources (such as environmental effects, explosives, or specific weapon traits).
- The specific effects are noted in the ability or rule.
AnchoredThis model cannot be pushed or moved by enemy effects unless otherwise stated.
- Represents exceptional mass, stance, or fortification.
